using namespace std;

/*-------begin of main---------*/
int main()
{
	TEST
	{
		int R,C,ans=1,bag,min_bag,collection,min_collection;
		scanf("%d %d",&R,&C);
		int A[C],B[C];
		For(i,0,C-1)
		{
			s(A[i]);	
		}	
		For(j,1,C-1)
		{
			B[j]=A[j]-A[j-1];	
			
		}
		bag=min_bag=R-1;
		collection=min_collection=1;
		For(j,1,C-1)
		{
			bag-=B[j];
			collection+=B[j];	
			if(B[j]==0)
			{
				collection--;
			}
			
			min_bag=min(min_bag,bag);
			min_collection=min(min_collection,collection);
			
		}
		if(min_collection>0 && min_bag>=0)
		pln(1);
		else if(min_bag<=0)
		pln(-1);
		else
		{
			if(min_bag+min_collection<0 || 2-min_collection>R)
 		   	printf("-1\n");
    		else
   			printf("%d\n",2-min_collection);
				
		}
		
	}
	
}
